message: I'll give you $200,000, you get $800,000. It's a good starting point, don't you think?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but you're still getting a good chunk of change!
You're getting a smaller share, but I'm still willing to give you a decent amount. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away the farm just yet!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll give you a slightly smaller share. Don't think you're getting off that easy, though!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect me to go easy on you, though!
I'm running out of time, but I'll give you a smaller share. This is my last chance to get a decent deal!
